富貴女神Katrina_inl年初一係instagram乞錢被踢爆係狗女🤭由於生活太過富貴與狗父收入唔成正比，惹來熱烈討論。該po係熱門三日之後開po嘅連登用戶自爆，account連po消失係連登，其後另一名連登用戶再度開po但今日亦都消失埋😨🤯



Katrina_inl個老豆葉智文係反送中運動期間立咗大功～～於二零二零年二月二十七日獲晉升為總警司

https://www.police.gov.hk/offbeat/1155/chi/8504.html




身為IG女神嘅Katrina Ip睇佢IG就知道佢生活非常富貴，出入高級餐廳同埋由頭到腳都係名牌，包括Cartier 10鑽Love Bracelet, Hermes Mini Kelly 以及Hermes Constance😍😍 大家交稅係出糧比班狗，出錢比佢地買新玩具之如就係供養狗女買名牌






唔好誤會我絕對唔係憎人富貴厭人貧 而係想話你知你老豆手上沾有無數手足嘅血 搵返嚟嘅都係污糟錢











一人一report 報比MI5話佢老竇係高級警務人員但係收入同支出唔成正比，所以佢有機會係間諜同對英國國土安全造成危險，驅逐佢出境搞到佢書都冇得讀
https://www.gov.uk/report-suspicious-activity-to-mi5

比MI5嘅篤灰report
I noticed on social media that a Hong Kong Chief Superintendent’s daughter - Katrina Ip is currently studying in London. I believe she may cause serious threat to the national security of the UK.

Her father was only promoted to Chief Superintendent in February 2020, which is highly likely a result of his involvement during the Anti Extradition Bill Movement in 2019. She portrays an incredibly luxurious lifestyle on her social media, one that is disproportionate to the lifestyle a family on a Chief Superintendent’s salary can afford. Which raises concern as to whether her family is receiving additional financial support from the Chinese Government. If so, she may be conducting espionage and propaganda activities detrimental to the national security of the UK during her time studying in the UK.

Below are the social media links which I found:
［揀幾張富貴逼人照之後貼link］

狗女兩姊妹～家姐Christyyyyipp 妹妹Katrina Ip🐶🐶 不過家姐就叻女啦 咁細個已經落過仔 經手人仲要係黑人～ （聽講兩姐妹都好淫蕩）



狗乸Tina Yeung （據聞10年前做銅鑼灣IT)

富貴女神Katrina_inl年初一係instagram乞錢被踢爆係狗女🤭由於生活太過富貴與狗父收入唔成正比，惹來熱烈討論。該po係熱門三日之後開po嘅連登用戶自爆，account連po消失係連登，其後另一名連登用戶再度開po但今日亦都消失埋😨🤯



Katrina_inl個老豆葉智文係反送中運動期間立咗大功～～於二零二零年二月二十七日獲晉升為總警司

https://www.police.gov.hk/offbeat/1155/chi/8504.html




身為IG女神嘅Katrina Ip睇佢IG就知道佢生活非常富貴，出入高級餐廳同埋由頭到腳都係名牌，包括Cartier 10鑽Love Bracelet, Hermes Mini Kelly 以及Hermes Constance😍😍 大家交稅係出糧比班狗，出錢比佢地買新玩具之如就係供養狗女買名牌






唔好誤會我絕對唔係憎人富貴厭人貧 而係想話你知你老豆手上沾有無數手足嘅血 搵返嚟嘅都係污糟錢











一人一report 報比MI5話佢老竇係高級警務人員但係收入同支出唔成正比，所以佢有機會係間諜同對英國國土安全造成危險，驅逐佢出境搞到佢書都冇得讀
https://www.gov.uk/report-suspicious-activity-to-mi5

比MI5嘅篤灰report
I noticed on social media that a Hong Kong Chief Superintendent’s daughter - Katrina Ip is currently studying in London. I believe she may cause serious threat to the national security of the UK.

Her father was only promoted to Chief Superintendent in February 2020, which is highly likely a result of his involvement during the Anti Extradition Bill Movement in 2019. She portrays an incredibly luxurious lifestyle on her social media, one that is disproportionate to the lifestyle a family on a Chief Superintendent’s salary can afford. Which raises concern as to whether her family is receiving additional financial support from the Chinese Government. If so, she may be conducting espionage and propaganda activities detrimental to the national security of the UK during her time studying in the UK.

Below are the social media links which I found:
